title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4038.11 - Collusive claiming punished
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4038.11 - Collusive claiming punished

State Regulations

Should the stewards be of the opinion that any person
is claiming a horse collusively for the benefit of another interest or in order
to evade the provision of any sections of this Article, they may require such
person to make an affidavit that he or she is not so doing, and if upon proof
it is ascertained that such person made a false affidavit, such person shall be
referred to the commission for further action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4038.11

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 52, eff. 12/28/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
